div.p:
This is just a friendly reminder from the Doc Pickard Scholarship Committee
Summer Applications have been extended to be Due May 15, 2020. Due to the Convid-19 Pandemic. Please send your applications and current transcript asap to: Fannindel ISD Attn: Discha Threlkeld, 601 W. Main St. Ladonia, TX 75449

div.h4: Fannindel ISD is still accepting incoming transfer students!
div.p: Fannindel ISD is still accepting incoming transfer students for the 2019-20 school year. If you are looking for smaller class sizes and more individualized educating, contact us today! 903-367-7251
